summary: I am retired an only available for tasks / jobs / projects in sustainability/environment/nature/ecology and in healthy living.

profile_positions.description:
IM-aces is een team van resultaatgerichte ervaren experts die bereid zijn ondernemingen te helpen op het vlak van technische en commerciële innovatievraagstukken tegen een betaalbaar tarief.

IM-ACES is een toegankelijk en betaalbaar kenniscentrum waar bedrijven terecht kunnen met problemen, technische vraagstukken, ideeën en innovaties in de breedste zin van het woord. Daarnaast creeërt IM-ACES marketing & sales concepten om innovaties om te zetten in realiteit.

De basis, maar tevens de kern van IM-ACES wordt gevormd door (vroeg)gepensioneerde professionals die altijd op een zeer hoog kennisniveau hebben geacteerd in multinationals. Zij zijn bereid hun parate kennis, ervaring én internationale netwerk aan te wenden en te delen met anderen.
profile_positions.title: Project Engineer

profile_positions.description: Rockwool is primarily known as a manufacturer of mineral wool insulation. It also produces and sells Rockwool stone wool products such as acoustic ceilings (Rockfon), outer cladding (Rock Panel), loose fibers for, among others, asbestos fiber replacement in brake pads and gaskets (Lapinus Fibres) and cultivation substrates for professional greenhouses (Grodan). As a product manager within the Supply Chain department of the Grodan Group, I was the link between sales organizations worldwide and production departments, product specifications, quality improvements, packaging concepts and packing materials. My primary focus was on the production sites in Roermond and Breda. I also supported the production sites in Doense (Denmark), Malkinia (Poland) and Toronto (Canada). Main tasks were the implementation of developed products in production and maintenance of products based on client wish, quality analysis, demands and remarks from sales etc.
profile_positions.title: Product Manager / Supply Chain Engeneer

profile_positions.description: As a product manager in the production efficiency section in the sales department for Benelux, France, Spain and Portugal, I was the link between the sales and production departments. I was responsible for product, quality improvements, packaging concepts and materials and the implementation of new products and product enhancements in production. Production locations in Roermond, Breda, Caparosso (Spain) and Doense (Denmark)
profile_positions.title: Product Manager Grodan Benelux and France

profile_positions.description: In this position I was responsible for short-term product development based on customer wishes and questions/wishes of Marketing/Sales and improvements in products and production processes based on the results of analysis of complaints. I also managed the product specifications including its improvement following the results of the evaluations of the process performance.
profile_positions.title: Product Development Manager Grodan Benelux and France

profile_positions.description:
In this position I was responsible for managing and controlling the long-term product development projects. Initially only propagation products and later in the floriculture and vegetable sectors. Creation of product concepts, initiating and managing test productions/prototypes, testing prototypes in laboratory tests and field trials tests. Developing of production systems and the implementation of new products int production at various production sites in The Netherlands and Denmark. After the development and implementation of the product support of the sales organisation in the launch of the new products. Evaluation of the implementation, initiate necessary adjustments and scaling up production .
Large projects in this period were the ADS (Active Drainage System), anti- weed systems in Rose blocks, adding clay pellets and organic matter to the rockwool substrates and cost-saving projects.
profile_positions.title: Business Development Manager, Group R & D

profile_positions.description: Setting up  and managing a department for internal auditing of the newly designed and implemented Quality Assurance System (certified according to ISO 9002). In this function, I had one directs subordinate and 8-10 internal auditors on a temporary basis. This temporary auditors had their own function within the Rockwool organisation and were exempted to carry out Quality Audits (2x-3x per year) under my management.
profile_positions.title: Audit Manager

profile_positions.description: Quality Assurance ManagerManaging the laboratory that executes quality test and runs analysis on quality data produces by the production departments. Leading three people in permanent employment plus 1-3 temporary trainees. Reporting quality information to production management giving advice on the quality issues including improvement of products to the production departments of the establishment Roermond and production management team, based on the executed laboratory tests, complaint analysis analysis of quality testing done in the production departments. Taking the first steps for the future implementation of Statistical Process Control (Datalyser). Supporting the QA Director during the introduction of the quality system according to ISO 9002. For this I wrote parts of the system and the implemented procedures and instructions in the production and logistics departments.
profile_positions.title: Quality Assurance Manager

profile_positions.description: Development of new products, packaging concepts and production systems in the pioneering stage of a new product line (Grodan stone wool horticultural substrates ) for the manufacturer of Rockwool stone wool insulation products Rockwool Lapinus BV. Major achievement was the introduction of the first pallet packaging in the history of the Rockwool International Group. In those days the best and most economical solution to transport stone wool was to pack the bulky wool products  in packs and cartons and load them manually in the biggest trucks available. Only after we had demonstrated we could load more products in a truck on pallets compared to loading the product in boxes in the truck and therefore safe on transport cost, added with savings in packing material and handling costs, the introduction was approved. I developed and implemented Later also growing mats packed on pallets and now ( since about 2005 ) are the standard packaging for pallets production facility in Roermond and most other production sites.
profile_positions.title: Product Manager, Product Engeneer

profile_positions.description: I worked as a trainee and was trained as Junior Tea Trader. Next to gaining knowledge of tea in all its types, variations and qualities I was involved in making quotes for various clients in the Netherlands and abroad, based on market data (eg. realized prices at tea auctions in the countries of origin). Furthermore, the trainees active in preparing the tasting and assessing the different tea samples we received from the tea producers (plantations in the countries of origin) and preparing and sending samples to customers (Tea blenders that produce tea for the consumer market).
profile_positions.title: Junior Tea Trader (trainee)

volunteer_experiences.description:
Instructing a team of novice rowers to a decent level. Every year this start an instruction periode of 10 weeks (2 evenings a week). After this period, these rowers are guided to a higher level and some other rowers of the club are helped increase their rowing skills 
2011, 3 intermediate rowers guided to achieve the required exams 
2012, instructe two completely inexperienced rowers. 
2013 and 2014, instructed 4 complete novice rowers and instructed various rowers to improve their sculling skills in a skiff (one person boat).

2009 - 2013 Supervising a race rowing squad. A 5 women rowing crew wanted to improve their skills and take part in some races. In the first year the women passed some higher level exams and won a time trial race in Tilburg in a training type boat (C4x). In laters years the women honed their skills in a true racing boat (4x with coxswain). In 2010, 2011, 2012 and 2013 the took part in the same race in Tilburg in the “racing class” with mixed but satisfying results.
2013 and 2014, Coaching a number of people who wanted to improve their rowing level and pass some exams in order to be allowed to row in better (faster but more difficult to row) boats and participate in various races in the Netherlands and abroad. 
2014 Coaching a ladies-8 for the Limburg Boat Race (Race over 5 km with participation of 3 Limburg rowing clubs).

Once per month conducting exams for rowing (sculling and sweeping) and steering at various levels. Besides a motivation to become better rowers, these exams are designed to assess whether the members have sufficient knowledge and skills to safely row on the River Meuse and in which boats they are allowed to row. The higher the level of the rower or the cox, the better (higher quality, faster but more difficult to row) the boats they are allowed to row and steer.

Stimulate and coordinate participation of Aeneas members in Rowing races. Register for races and other contests, arrange transport of boats, advise competitive rowers and their coaches, liaising with rowing event organisers etc. Taking part in the board of the club. (Monthly meetings, preparing general meetings, advising other board members in their fields of work, representing the club externally etc.)
